related_questions.question:
I can .... fresher fish there.    a.buying
b.bought
c.buys
d.buy

mohon tolong jawab ya, dan beri penjelasan atau alasan.

yg gk tau gk usah jawab​

answers.answer:
Jawaban:

D.

Penjelasan:

Buying adalah pembelian

bought adalah dibeli

buys adalah membeli sama dengan buy tetapi buy adalah simpel past tence

related_questions.question:
There is a new mature tourism park in my town called Panorama Kedah Tempunak. The park is located in Tempunak    Kapuas village. It only takes thirty minutes from my house by motorcycle to go there. It is a very big park, with colorful
flowers everywhere. There are also many fruit plants, such as papayas, rambutans, rose apples, and dragon fruits. In
the middle of the park, there is a big lake. ive can explore the lake by using small duck-like boats. Next to the lake, there
is a grassy landscape that makes the park looks green and fertile. The park has some outdoor benches and hammocks
where we can sit and enjoy the view while eating snacks and drink. The park is really worth a visit.
36. What can we find in Panorama Kedah Tempunak?
A indoor benches
B. small river
C. friendly villagers
D. grassy landscape
37. How long does it take to go there from the writer house?
A. 20 minutes
B. 25 minutes
C.30 minutes
D. 35 minutes
38 Which statement is NOT TRUE about the park based on the text above?
A. There is a big lake in the middle of the park
C. there are lion-shape boats in the lake.
B. There are many fruit plants in the park
D. the park is located in Tempunak​

answers.answer:
